data.name: Gotcha Covered of Colleyville
data.address: 6557 Glenview Dr #1725, North Richland Hills, TX 76180

reviews.text: Jennifer with Gotcha Covered of Colleyville is absolutely amazing!  She was so knowledgeable, kind and patient with us as we weren't exactly sure what we needed.  Jennifer came to our rescue with many fabulous suggestions! We narrowed it down to the perfect look for our space, and it is so beautiful!  If you need any type of window treatments, we highly recommend Jennifer!  Her installer was so kind as well!  Jennifer's service was truly exemplary!
We love the new curtains! They have brought so much warmth and coziness to our home. The install was wonderful. Mike and I are very happy. Thank you Jennifer. ❤️

Jennifer was amazing.  She came over measured my windows and ordered the blinds.  She suggested a shutter for one architectural window and a shade for another window. They both turned out beautiful.  She is a jewel and her installers were the best.  Very easy to work with were knowledgeable and speedy.  My blinds were made to fit and look lovely.  Thank you Gotcha Covered for a pleasant transition of my window coverings.

The new shades look great and are perfect in keeping the morning sunlight from piercing through the window. Jennifer did a great job,  provided great advice on color and style. We enjoyed the entire process from selection to installation.

Gotcha Covered went above and beyond! Words can't express how much I appreciated working with Jennifer and all she diid to make our large restaurant project done in a quick turnaround. She even tracked down the curtains and picked them up before they were delivered to ensure we had them up before the grand opening. I highly recommend Gotcha Covered because of Jennifer's hard work, great communication, and beautiful end results!

I am very glad that I purchased my shutters from Gotcha Covered.  The shutters fit perfectly and are are beautiful!  Jennifer was very knowledgeable about the product and helped me choose the right ones for my home.  There are many decisions to make when choosing and installing shutters and she was with me every step of the way.  She came to my home during the measurement and installation and answered all of my questions.  Give Jennifer a call.  She sells quality shutters at a reasonable price a

I worked with Jennifer who helped me design a fabric Roman shade for a door. I was very specific as to what as I wanting to accomplish. Her design expertise was exactly what I was needing. Jennifer was on time to my in home appointment and sent me reminder before she came. She brought many books of fabric choices and she even emailed me pictures of an alternative fabric choice after she left my home. The fabric choices were over the top beautiful and plentiful as I chose a embroidered design fab

This was a wonderful experience! Jennifer took time to understand our needs and understand our budget. In addition, she was great in helping us decide what would look best with our floors and walls! Made the experience much more enjoyable! I highly recommend Gotcha Covered of Colleyville for any window coverings you need!

Just had new indoor shades from "Gotcha' Covered" installed.  They are exactly what I wanted, and the installation was quick and professional.  Very pleased with the variety available, the color and texture offered, the service, and the install!  Contact Jennifer Leenheer at Gotcha' Covered with questions or to make an appointment.

Selecting window treatments was a breeze with Jennifer's help!  She made the job much easier by bringing samples to my home.  She took care of all the measurements and installation as well.  I would recommend her to anyone!
We love our new shutters!  Jennifer did a great job and gave great advice!  We enjoyed the entire process from gathering ideas to installation!

Beware.  This business is very unprofessional.  Made an appointment and left my number with corporate answering service.  They did not call to confirm.  Didn't show up to appoint and then called later in day to say “hey, we saw you cancelled, if you like to reschedule……”.  Then proceeded to blame on corporate service and then me because I didnt leave an email.  When I told then I was no longer interested in their service, they really got an attitude.  I told them they were unprofessional an to n

We love our blinds! After shopping around several places, we went with Gotcha Covered, andI’m so glad we did. The blinds are everything we wanted and more. Great quality, great price, and great service.

Best damn attention I have gotten from anyone or any company since I have dealt with contractors.
The product and Jennifer were amazing.
If you want it ONCE and DONE the look no further.
It was wonderful to work with Jennifer and her team - not only was she professional and a joy to work with, but my windows turned out beautifully!
Quick installation and reasonable price, def recommended
